name: Roots (Jezzalittle)
description:
“Roots” is a side on couch multiplayer battle arena game (Super smash brothers,  Duck game) where you play as a druid tasked with the challenge of defeating other players by grappling around the map and shooting projectiles at your friends

Roots was created during GGJ 2023: Roots. It took 72 hours to complete development

Controls

Keyboard

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Grapple
  • Space - Jump

Controller

  • Left Stick - Movement/Aim
  • Square/X - Shoot
  • Right Trigger - Grapple
  • X/A - Jump

Created and Developed by:

  • Jeremy Little
  • Nima Karimi
